price: 67. (Khadir) wuxuu yidhi: Adigu ma kareysid la jirkayga samir.
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ مَعِيَ صَبۡرٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla innaka lan tastaṭīʿa maʿiya ṣabran
